effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.sun-moon: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
